text: The 2025 Brazilian Football Championship Series A, officially Brasileirão Betano – Série A 2025 for sponsorship reasons, will be the 70th edition of the top division of Brazilian football. The competition has the same rules as previous years, when the points system was implemented. There will be a break for the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup which will be held between June 13 and July 15 in the United States . This edition will feature Mirassol 's debut in the elite of Brazilian football, being the fifth team to debut in the first division since the beginning of the points-based era, in 2003 . The last time there was a debut was 4 years ago, with Cuiabá, relegated last season to Série B. Furthermore, with the relegation of Athletico Paranaense in the 2024 edition, it will be the first time since 1990 that Série A has no teams representing the State of Paraná . ==References== Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A
title: 2025 Brazilian Football Championship - Series A
